author: Rob Goldberg
title: Colin Kaepernick Starts Know Your Rights Fund to Help Minorities Amid COVID-19
description: Former  NFL  quarterback  Colin Kaepernick  announced Thursday he has launched the  Know Your Rights Camp COVID-19 Relief Fund to help minority communities during the ongoing coronavirus ...
content:
Todd Kirkland/Associated Press
Former NFL quarterback Colin Kaepernick announced Thursday he has launched the Know Your Rights Camp COVID-19 Relief Fund to help minority communities during the ongoing coronavirus pandemic:
